import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import iconArrow from '../images/icon-arrow-up.svg' import iconArrowDown from '../images/icon-arrow-down.svg' import openIcon from '../images/icon-menu.svg' import closeIcon from '../images/icon-close-menu.svg' const Hero = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [open2, setOpen2] = useState(false) const [navbarOpen, setNavbarOpen] = useState(false) const handleDropDownOpen = () => { setOpen(true) } const handleDropDownClose = () => { setOpen(false) } const toggleMenu = () => { setNavbarOpen(!navbarOpen) } const hideMenu = () => { setNavbarOpen(false) } return (
